title: Software Engineer
skills: Understading the OOPs concept and Design Pattern
Familier with version conrol (like Git,Git Hub/Git Lab)
Knowledge of software development methodologies (like Agile,Scrum)
Ability to use IDEs ans developement tools efficiently
description: Software Engineers design, develop, and maintain software systems.
about: This role of the software Engineer is a professionall who design,develops,test,and maintains software systems to solve problems or fulfill specific business needs. Their role goes beyond writing code - they are responsible for understanding requirements,creating efficient solutions,ensuring software quality and collabrting with others.
